# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `part_clubs`
* Variable label: `Participation in any club/community group`
* Variable description: `Active participation in any club/association/community group (i.e. doing sth together with the group at least several times a year) or declaration of membership`
* Domain: `Social environment`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No
1        | Yes

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing
